message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll take the majority, you get a small share, but it's a good start!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but you'll still get a decent chunk!
I'll take a small share, you get most of it, but I'm being generous!
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm taking the majority!
I'll give up, you take it all, but I'm not going down without a fight!
